title: The Left Is Herding America | Guests: Aubrey Shines & Paul Kengor | 9/10/20
description:
The Left’s plans to lead us to revolution and civil war are clear. We won’t know who won the presidency on election night. What would the world look like without freedom? Bishop Aubrey Shines, chairman of the Conservative Clergy of Color, joins to discuss a message from black pastors to Nike: Stop the “anti-Christian” Black Lives Matter campaign. People are appalled by the Netflix show “Cuties,” but even worse things are entering our schools’ sex-ed programs. The Left is using fear to herd Americans like sheep or cattle exactly where they want us, but we outnumber them. “The Devil and Karl Marx” author Paul Kengor discusses how Marx’s deep affinity for Satan helped form the principles of communism that are still brewing today.
